question: My mom is a sixty five year old smoker for almost all her life, has diabetes, two strokes, kidney failure and now found out she has a cancerous tumor on her lung the size of a baseball. It has already touched her lymphatic system and the doc says its inoperable. The only treatment thats available is chemo and radiation although im unsure of what type of lung cancer it is and even if she has a good fighting chance with al thats against her. I am very scared does anyone know anything about what form this is or could shed some light.
title: my mom just got diagnosed with lung cancer
